app.name: HestiaLabs Experiences
app.description: We create a new relationship to personal data

footer-digipower-academy: The Digipower.academy has emerged out of projects initiated separately by {sitra}, {migros} (via {hestialabs} and {personaldataio})

sar-builder.intro: Fill in the form below to generate your Subject Access Request from your data.
sar-builder.add-data-description: First add the files you want to include in the SAR.
sar-builder.filter-description: Then select the data points you wish to include.
sar-builder.infos-description: Fill in your details and the company to contact.
sar-builder.send-sar-description: Finally, copy the generated SAR text or send it directly.
sar-builder.no-data: No data was found in the files you provided.
